name: Healthyfied Rice Alt - Buttered Carrot and Beans
description: This 'Healthyfied Rice Alt - Buttered Carrot and Beans' recipe is a perfect example of a delicious low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar dish that does not compromise on taste. Designed for those seeking a healthy alternative without sacrificing flavor, it's a must-try for everyone looking to add more healthful recipes to their diet.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare the ingredients: Cut the carrots into small pieces and blanch the green beans.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: In a pan over medium heat, melt the butter.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the carrots to the pan and cook until they start to soften.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the blanched green beans to the pan with the carrots and cook for another 5 minutes until everything is heated through and slightly golden.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the buttered carrots and beans hot as a delightful side dish or a light main course.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
